AdminIndexPage.welcomeDescription: Here's a quick overview of your platform's performance today.

emptyState.title: You don't have any courses yet!
emptyState.description: You don't have any courses. Create some to see them here.

TrialBanner.title: You are on a 14-day free trial!
TrialBanner.description: You have {days} days left. Upgrade now to unlock all features and keep your platform running.

enrollmentChart.title: Total Enrollments
enrollmentChart.description: Total Enrollments for the last 30 days: {total}

Metadata.description: {tenantName} is your premier destination for online learning. Explore our courses today.

hero.title: Elevate Your Learning
hero.description: Discover a new way to learn with our modern, interactive learning management system. Access high-quality courses anytime, anywhere.

features.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
features.description: Experience the future of education with our comprehensive learning ecosystem

teaching.title: Empower Your Teaching
teaching.description: Seamless tools for instructors to create, publish, and manage high-quality educational content with ease.

learningPath.title: Discover Your Learning Path
learningPath.description: Students easily find relevant courses and engage with modern, interactive content tailored to their needs.

content.title: Diverse & In-Demand Content
content.description: Access a rich library of specialized courses, continuously updated to align with current industry demands.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.description: Join thousands of learners who have already transformed their careers with our platform

Footer.newsletterTitle: Join our learning community and unlock your potential.

dialogs.successDescription: Your email has been successfully registered to our newsletter. We'll be in touch soon!
dialogs.errorDescription: Please enter a valid email address.

Auth.SIGN_IN_DESCRIPTION: Welcome back! Please enter your details.
Auth.SIGN_UP_DESCRIPTION: Enter your details to get started.
Auth.NAME: Name
Auth.FORGOT_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Enter your email to receive a reset link.
Auth.signOutError: Failed to sign out. Please try again.

Validation.PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: Password must be at least 8 characters
Validation.INVALID_EMAIL_OR_PASSWORD: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Validation.USER_ALREADY_EXISTS: A user with this email already exists. Please sign in.
